summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4701 for the improvement of 20th Avenue South from Orcas Street to the north line of Maynard's Addition to Georgetown, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 54483, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
